arts.ttl: Ryan Reynolds buys Christmas drinks in Wrexham
arts.sum: Ryan Reynolds treated Wrexham's locals to an early Christmas gift on his latest trip to north Wales -- and he brought more Hollywood celebrities along for the ride.

arts.ttl: Reynolds gives Wrexham locals early Christmas gifts and watches team play with famous guests
arts.sum: Reynolds, who co-owns Wrexham’s soccer club with Rob McElhenney, watched the team draw with Cambridge 2-2 on Saturday in the company of actor and producer Channing Tatum, who appeared in the latest “Deadpool and Wolverine” movie alongside Reynolds. The previous night, Reynolds went to a pub in the center of Wrexham and said he would be buying a round of drinks for everyone there.

arts.ttl: Late equaliser denies Wrexham come-from-behind win
Ryan Reynolds joined by Green Day star Billie Joe Armstrong to witness late Wrexham upset
arts.sum: Wrexham drew 2-2 with Cambridge United in the League One clash and owner Ryan Reynolds was joined by other major stars at the Racecourse Ground

arts.ttl: Ryan Reynolds watches on as Cambridge deny Wrexham with late leveller
arts.sum: Steven Fletcher looked to have grabbed the winner only for Nlundulu’s late penalty to earn Cambridge a deserved point.

arts.ttl: Ryan Reynolds shows up at Wrexham pub with Channing Tatum and buys everyone a drink
arts.sum: The Hollywood duo stunned patrons at the Fat Boar pub in Wrexham

arts.ttl: Paul Mullin opens up on Wrexham "embarrassment" and generous Ryan Reynolds offer
arts.sum: Wrexham have achieved back-to-back promotions from the National League to League One and are now vying for top spot in the third tier as they eye further success under their Hollywood owners

arts.ttl: Liverpool stars visit Wrexham fan with cancer as Virgil van Dijk shows true colours
arts.sum: Liverpool stars paid a visit to see lifelong Wrexham fan Archie White in hospital as he battles with cancer

arts.ttl: Wrexham star backed to play in Premier League amid glowing verdict
arts.sum: Former Arsenal goalkeeper Arthur Okonkwo still has the potential to play at the top level, according to Mark Howard

arts.ttl: Wrexham star makes feelings clear on 'hands-on' owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney
arts.sum: Wrexham goalkeeper Mark Howard has hailed the owners' open-door policy towards players and staff
